response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market value of $15,000, making it an attractive proposition for you. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success. Please let me know if you require any further information or assistance.", "product_price": 12000}
